mapper.update: INSERT INTO doctor (userId, doctorName, cityName, hospitalName, departmentName, introduction) VALUES (#{userId}, #{doctorName}, #{cityName}, #{hospitalName}, #{departmentName}, #{introduction}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE doctorName = VALUES(doctorName), cityName = VALUES(cityName), hospitalName = VALUES(hospitalName), departmentName = VALUES(departmentName), introduction = VALUES(introduction)
